long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
EmoGuard is a browser extension that allows you to block text or elements you don't want to see on any website.

â¤ KEY FEATURES

â€¢ Keyword blocking:
Block keywords you don't want to see

â€¢ Customizing CSS selectors:
Pursue your own way of blocking

â€¢ Sync feature:
Sync data across all your devices using Dropbox

â€¢ Cross platform:
Supports desktop and some mobile browsers

â¤ Why use EmoGuard?

â€¢ Get over the slander:
There are all kinds of people in the world. You can't change them, but you can control the information on the web pages you view with EmoGuard.

â€¢ Avoid any spoilers:
Spoilers sneak up on you like assassins and suddenly appear. Don't worry anymore, you can prevent it by adding the relevant words to EmoGuard.

â€¢ Focus on what matters:
Once people feel bad, they spend their time on distractions. So save your emotions with EmoGuard and use your precious time for what matters.

â¤ More

For more information on how to use the extension, please visit the official website.
https://emoguard.app/

It's time to bring back the fun web.
Happy Internet Life!

â¤ Release Notes

1.3.1
â€¢ Added feature to register keywords to the blocklist by right-clicking.
â€¢ Added option to always show whitelist.
â€¢ Updated default CSS selectors.
â€¢ Updated popup design.
â€¢ Fixed issue where the enable/disable of CSS selectors could not be overridden on each website.
â€¢ Fixed CSS selectors to be registered without converting letter case.

1.3.0
â€¢ Added whitelist feature.
â€¢ Added reset feature.
â€¢ Keyword detection sensitivity can now be adjusted.
â€¢ The popup icon now reflects the on/off status of the extension.
â€¢ Updated default CSS selectors.
â€¢ Fixed the popup screen design.
â€¢ Fixed an issue where keywords were not blocked in certain situations.
â€¢ Improved performance by skipping some processing when possible.

1.2.4
â€¢ Improved accuracy of keyword blocking.
â€¢ Fixed a sync bug.

1.2.3
â€¢ Improved stability and quality of keyword blocking.
â€¢ Fixed an issue that caused an error in Cloud Integration.

1.2.2
â€¢ Improved performance of keyword blocking.
â€¢ Fixed some bugs.

1.2.1
â€¢ Significantly improved performance of keyword blocking.

1.2.0
â€¢ Added CSS selector sorting feature.
â€¢ Added keyword sorting feature.

1.1.0
â€¢ Simplified the design of the extension's popup.
â€¢ Added customization mode for power users. Customization can be enabled from "â‹®" in the top right of the popup.

1.0.0
â€¢ Released EmoGuard.
